## Type of change

- Bug fix (fix) (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- New feature (feat) (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- Update (chore) (documentation, packages, or tests updates, nothing that affects the end user directly)
- Test (test) (adding missing tests or fixing existing tests, Unit Test, Playwright, etc)
- Release (release) (new version of the application, only for production releases)

- Closes #<issue-number>
